title: feature #70: Add `id_pat` attribute
body:
- This allows pattern matching with enum variants

Fixes: https://github.com/sharksforarms/deku/issues/70

title: Remove test module
body:
Module `tests` is unnecessary when #[test] is used in the tests
directory.

title: feature #63: Add `cond` attribute
body:
- Make it work with `skip` for a "skip if" construct
- Make it work with default

Fixes https://github.com/sharksforarms/deku/issues/63

title: Use pass by value (1 byte vs 8 bytes)
Attempt to add context support
build(deps): update hex-literal requirement from 0.2 to 0.3
body:
Updates the requirements on [hex-literal](https://github.com/RustCrypto/utils) to permit the latest version.
Commits
  • 4414536 hex-literal v0.3 (#53)
  • d19e433 cpuid-bool: fix SGX support (take 2) (#68)
  • 93d93bd cpuid-bool: fix SGX support (#67)
  • 9b269d5 Remove deprecated crates (#66)
  • ad504c5 clippy and fmt
  • e77c844 remove Travis CI badge
  • 840213d commit Cargo.lock
  • e19d64d add workspace and security audit workflows
  • b4be463 Migrate to Github Actions (#65)
  • 0ddc5c4 minor doctest edit
  • Additional commits viewable in compare view

Dependabot will resolve any conflicts with this PR as long as you don't alter it yourself. You can also trigger a rebase manually by commenting `@dependabot rebase`. Dependabot commands and options

title: Error if rest isn't empty on try_from
Impl over IpAddr, Ipv4Addr and Ipv6Addr
Read from bytes improvements
body:
- Removes an unsafe{}
- Allows impl on f32/f64

title: Merge count argument of BitsReaderItems into BitsReader
Add a "reader" attribute
body:
This allows clients to specify how they want to read a value (conditions, etc)

Fixes #8

title: Increase composability
body:
Allow users to define structs and compose deku objects

Fixes https://github.com/sharksforarms/deku/issues/5
